amendment.description: To shorten the time given to a property owner to respond to a violation of a contract and the time given to the Secretary to develop a Compliance, Disposition, and Enforcement Plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3918 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3918 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3918 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3918 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3896.
